forecast-period.text: The chance of fog early this morning. Sunny afternoon. Light winds becoming north to northeasterly 20 to 30 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the late evening.
Surf conditions may be more powerful than they appear and are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing and swimming.
High
Sun protection 8:50am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]

Becoming cloudy. The chance of fog in the early morning. Medium (50%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. Winds north to northwesterly 20 to 30 km/h becoming light in the late afternoon then becoming southerly 25 to 35 km/h in the evening.
Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely in the morning. Winds south to southwesterly 25 to 35 km/h.
Mostly sunny. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h turning south to southeasterly during the morning then becoming light during the afternoon.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting east to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting east to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending northwest to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning.
Morning cloud clearing to a sunny afternoon. Winds northerly 15 to 20 km/h turning northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the early afternoon.

Surf conditions may be more powerful than they appear and are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing and swimming. Surf Life Saving NSW recommends only swimming at patrolled beaches and between the red and yellow flags.
High
Sun protection 8:50am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]

Becoming cloudy. The chance of fog in the early morning. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming northwest to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the morning then tending south to southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h in the late evening.

Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely during the day time. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending south to southeasterly 25 to 35 km/h during the day then tending south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the evening.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower along the coastal fringe in the morning. Near zero chance of rain elsewhere. Winds southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting east to southeasterly during the morning then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower later in the day. Light winds becoming east to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
The chance of fog early this morning. Sunny afternoon. Light winds becoming northeasterly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day.
Surf conditions may be more powerful than they appear and are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing and swimming.
High
Sun protection 8:50am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]
Partly cloudy. The chance of fog in the early morning. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the late afternoon and evening. Winds north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely during the day time. Winds northerly 15 to 25 km/h shifting south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day then becoming southerly 25 to 35 km/h during the afternoon.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower, most likely in the morning. Winds south to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds.
Partly cloudy. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower later in the day. Light winds becoming east to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Areas of fog early this morning. Sunny afternoon. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h in the early afternoon then becoming light in the late evening.
Surf conditions may be more powerful than they appear and are expected to be hazardous for coastal activities such as rock fishing and swimming.
High
Sun protection 8:40am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]

Partly cloudy. The chance of fog in the early morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then turning northeasterly in the middle of the day.
Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely during the day time. Winds north to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting southerly 20 to 30 km/h during the afternoon.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower, most likely in the morning. Winds southerly 20 to 30 km/h tending southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening.
Mostly sunny. Slight (30%) chance of a shower. Light winds.
Partly cloudy. Light winds.
Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower later in the day. Light winds becoming easterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Sunny. Light winds becoming northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the early afternoon then becoming light in the evening.
High
Sun protection 9:00am to 2:50pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]
Mostly sunny morning. Slight (30%) chance of a shower at night. Light winds becoming northwesterly 30 to 45 km/h in the morning then becoming light in the evening.
Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers during the day time. Light winds becoming northwest to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the afternoon.
Mostly sunny. Light winds becoming east to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening.
Sunny. Light winds.
Partly cloudy. Light winds becoming northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the day.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Light winds becoming northwesterly 20 to 25 km/h during the day.
Mostly sunny. Winds westerly 15 to 25 km/h tending northwesterly 20 to 30 km/h in the middle of the day then increasing to 30 to 45 km/h in the evening.
High
Sun protection 9:00am to 2:50pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]

Partly cloudy. Medium (50%) chance of showers or snow, most likely at night. Winds northwesterly 40 to 60 km/h tending northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening then becoming light in the late evening.
Cloudy. High (80%) chance of snow showers, most likely in the morning. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h turning southwesterly during the morning.
Mostly sunny. Light winds.
Sunny. Light winds.
Partly cloudy. Winds westerly 25 to 35 km/h tending northwesterly later.
Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers. Winds northwesterly 30 to 45 km/h tending westerly 35 to 50 km/h during the morning.
